FuncDef: This command creates a text description stored in the configuration file for a configuration context. Thedescriptioncommand associates a text string with a configuration context to help identify the content in the configuration file.

ParaDef.Info: The description character string. Allowed values are any string up to 160 characters composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.

ExtraInfo: Default: No description associated with the configuration context.
